summary: Redundant Mod: Create spell scrolls in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This was just somthing I was doing while playing around with the CK and Papyrus. 
I just wanted to see what I could do with scripting and other things. This mod 
will add a alteration spell that will allow you to create all the magic scrolls 
in the game. Your character must have a quill, inkwell, and paper for the spell 
to work. The spell will consume one paper for every scroll you create.

Install:

Copy or move the data folder from this file and paste it over to your data folder 
in your skyrim folder.

To add the spell:

Open the console
type in: player.addspell XX0012e4
XX is the mod load order.
or
Open the console 
type in: help \"Scribe Scroll\" 4
look for the spell id and add it
to the player using the command
player.addspell

Uninstall:
Delete the mod from your data folder. Remove the file aaaScribeScroll.pex 
from your script folder and and also remove the file aaaScribeScroll.psc
from the source folder inside your script folder.
author: Gshinji
